message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to get a better deal.
I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for my product. I'm offering it to you for $85.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $78? I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm offering it to you for $82.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $76? I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I need to stay within my budget.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make sure I get a good price for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'm offering it to you for $79.
